name: Safari Sundays
description:
We are a collective of nomadic designers, thinkers, inventors, misfits, explorers, muppets and makers are seeking great partners who aren't afraid to take the open road, choosing safaris over sightseeing and honesty over nonsense.
Together, with a perfect negroni in hand, we want to design brands and ideas that leave a memorable mark and make us better than we thought we could be.
